name: Dinner's ready!
objective: These %%icon icon-egg$%% eggs were randomly scattered throughout the room. Put one %%icon icon-egg$%% egg in each %%icon icon-cauldron$%% cauldron to prepare the dinner.
loss_reason_multiple_eggs_in_cauldron: You put multiple %%icon icon-egg$%% eggs in one %%icon icon-cauldron$%% cauldron
